sources.title: Escort for Hire
sources.description: Title: Escort for Hire Summary: Directed by: Godfrey Grayson Actors: June Thorburn, Pete Murray, Noel Trevarthen Production Company: Danziger Productions Ltd. Release Date: December 1960 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Unemployed actor Steve gets a job with Miss Kennedy's agency as an escort-bodyguard, but ends up being framed for murder after a wealthy client, Miss Elizabeth Quinn, is killed.
metadata.Actors: June Thorburn, Pete Murray, Noel Trevarthen
